Mary Vivian Pearce https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Vivian_Pearce 0 Mary Vivian Pearce (born November 9, 1947) is an American actress. She has worked primarily in the films of John Waters. Mary_Vivian Pearce ( born November_9_,_1947 ) is an_American_actress . She has_worked primarily in the_films of John_Waters .
